name: Felicity and Me
description:
=== This is a game for the Weekly Game Jam. To find out more, check out the jam  http://www.weeklygamejam.com/ or by looking for #WeeklyGameJam #WGJGame on twitter ===

This game is a short, text-based adventure game about a man named Jonah who is escorting a young woman named Felicity to her friend Ester on a planet named Aurora-9. It's a tale of friendship, love and betrayal. It's a fairly linear story but I've tried to make it a bit more detailed. Hope you like it.

Game is played via browser. Keywords will be hidden and highlighted in grey for convenience.  If the game crashes or gets stuck, don't be afraid to email me at alolamora21@gmail.com or via the itch.io info page. Criticisms, witticisms and very rude comments are appreciated. Thanks for playing!
